Klasse Portal

java.lang.Object
greenfoot.Actor
Portal
public class Portal extends greenfoot.Actor
A portal can be placed in the world to teleport actors to another portal.
Version:
27 September 2025
Autor:
Paul Jonas

  • Konstruktorübersicht

    Konstruktoren
    Konstruktor
    Beschreibung
    Portal()
    Creates a new blue portal.

  • Methodenübersicht

    Modifizierer und Typ
    Methode
    Beschreibung
    void
    createLinkedPortal()
    Creates a linked portal to the right of the current portal.
    void
    createLinkedPortal(int xOffset, int yOffset)
    Creates a linked portal at the given offset from the current portal's position.
    void

    Teleports the given actor to the linked portal's position.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • Portal

      public Portal()
      Creates a new blue portal. This acts as the main portal where an other portal is linked to.

  • Methodendetails

    • createLinkedPortal

      public void createLinkedPortal(int xOffset, int yOffset)
      Creates a linked portal at the given offset from the current portal's position. If a linked portal already exists, it is not replaced.
      Parameter:
      xOffset - the x offset from the current portal's position
      yOffset - the y offset from the current portal's position

    • createLinkedPortal

      public void createLinkedPortal()
      Creates a linked portal to the right of the current portal.

    • teleport

      public void teleport(greenfoot.Actor actor)
      Teleports the given actor to the linked portal's position. If no linked portal exists, an error message is displayed.
      Parameter:
      actor - the actor to teleport
